events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and it looks promising at first glance.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the primary role mentioned was software developer with relevant experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's profile and proceed with the initial screening for the engineering position.
The initial screening went well, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the next phase, expressing keen interest in the role and company.
Technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate to evaluate their core engineering skills in depth.
